mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
select distinct rm.menu_id from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update sys_user set `password` = #{newPassword} where user_id = #{userId} and password = #{password}
